title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 477.4 - Continuation of present appointments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 477.4 - Continuation of present appointments

State Regulations

Civilian employees of the division, now serving, may continue
to serve in the respective positions currently held by them. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
477.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
